com.camerontec.util.data

Class UnsafeBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.data.AbstractBuffer
      • com.camerontec.util.data.UnsafeBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Buffer, BufferOnByteArray, BufferOnByteBuffer

    public class UnsafeBuffer
extends AbstractBuffer
implements BufferOnByteArray, BufferOnByteBuffer
    A Buffer implementation which facilitates direct views over a range of byte array locations.

    The supported byte array locations are:

    • A byte array on the heap
    • A java.nio.ByteBuffer regardless of whether it is backed by on or off heap memory, memory mapped file, etc
    • An off heap memory region at a specified address.

    This implementation makes use internally of an excellent and open source implementation from the simple-binary-encoding project to do most of the work.

    As the name implies this implementation makes use of "unsafe" operations which means that all of the normal Java memory protection mechanisms are gone, including bounds checking and type alignment. Use it at your own risk.

    For alternate, "safe", options please see SafeBufferOnByteArray and SafeBufferOnByteBuffer.

    This class is not thread safe.

    • Field Summary
